snowball/Makefile - pgsql17devel-backend

  1. #-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2. #
  3. # Makefile for src/backend/snowball
  4. #
  5. # src/backend/snowball/Makefile
  6. #
  7. #-------------------------------------------------------------------------

  9. PGFILEDESC = "snowball - natural language stemmers"
  10. PGAPPICON = win32

  12. subdir = src/backend/snowball
  13. top_builddir = ../../..
  14. include $(top_builddir)/src/Makefile.global

  16. override CPPFLAGS := -I$(top_srcdir)/src/include/snowball \
  17.     -I$(top_srcdir)/src/include/snowball/libstemmer $(CPPFLAGS)

  19. OBJS = \
  20.     $(WIN32RES) \
  21.     api.o \
  22.     dict_snowball.o \
  23.     utilities.o

  25. OBJS += \
  26.     stem_ISO_8859_1_basque.o \
  27.     stem_ISO_8859_1_catalan.o \
  28.     stem_ISO_8859_1_danish.o \
  29.     stem_ISO_8859_1_dutch.o \
  30.     stem_ISO_8859_1_english.o \
  31.     stem_ISO_8859_1_finnish.o \
  32.     stem_ISO_8859_1_french.o \
  33.     stem_ISO_8859_1_german.o \
  34.     stem_ISO_8859_1_indonesian.o \
  35.     stem_ISO_8859_1_irish.o \
  36.     stem_ISO_8859_1_italian.o \
  37.     stem_ISO_8859_1_norwegian.o \
  38.     stem_ISO_8859_1_porter.o \
  39.     stem_ISO_8859_1_portuguese.o \
  40.     stem_ISO_8859_1_spanish.o \
  41.     stem_ISO_8859_1_swedish.o \

  43.     stem_ISO_8859_2_romanian.o \
  44.     stem_KOI8_R_russian.o \
  45.     stem_UTF_8_arabic.o \

  50.     stem_UTF_8_dutch.o \
  51.     stem_UTF_8_english.o \

  53.     stem_UTF_8_french.o \
  54.     stem_UTF_8_german.o \
  55.     stem_UTF_8_greek.o \
  56.     stem_UTF_8_hindi.o \
  57.     stem_UTF_8_hungarian.o \
  58.     stem_UTF_8_indonesian.o \
  59.     stem_UTF_8_irish.o \
  60.     stem_UTF_8_italian.o \
  61.     stem_UTF_8_lithuanian.o \

  69.     stem_UTF_8_spanish.o \
  70.     stem_UTF_8_swedish.o \
  71.     stem_UTF_8_tamil.o \
  72.     stem_UTF_8_turkish.o \
  73.     stem_UTF_8_yiddish.o

  75. stop_files = \
  76.     danish.stop \
  77.     dutch.stop \
  78.     english.stop \
  79.     finnish.stop \
  80.     french.stop \
  81.     german.stop \
  82.     hungarian.stop \
  83.     italian.stop \
  84.     nepali.stop \
  85.     norwegian.stop \
  86.     portuguese.stop \
  87.     russian.stop \
  88.     spanish.stop \
  89.     swedish.stop \
  90.     turkish.stop

  92. SQLSCRIPT= snowball_create.sql
  93. DICTDIR=tsearch_data

  95. VPATH += $(srcdir)/libstemmer

  97. NAME := dict_snowball
  98. rpath =

  100. all: all-shared-lib $(SQLSCRIPT)

  102. include $(top_srcdir)/src/Makefile.shlib

  104. $(SQLSCRIPT): snowball_create.pl snowball_func.sql.in snowball.sql.in
  105.     $(PERL) $< --input ${srcdir} --outdir .

  107. install: all installdirs install-lib install-script
  108.     $(INSTALL_DATA) $(addprefix $(srcdir)/stopwords/,$(stop_files)) '$(DESTDIR)$(datadir)/$(DICTDIR)'

  110. # $(SQLSCRIPT) might be in the srcdir or the build dir
  111. install-script: $(SQLSCRIPT)
  112.     $(INSTALL_DATA) $< '$(DESTDIR)$(datadir)'

  114. installdirs: installdirs-lib
  115.     $(MKDIR_P) '$(DESTDIR)$(datadir)' '$(DESTDIR)$(datadir)/$(DICTDIR)'

  117. uninstall: uninstall-lib
  118.     rm -f '$(DESTDIR)$(datadir)/$(SQLSCRIPT)'
  119.     rm -f $(addprefix '$(DESTDIR)$(datadir)/$(DICTDIR)/',$(stop_files))

  121. clean distclean: clean-lib
  122.     rm -f $(OBJS)
  123.     rm -f $(SQLSCRIPT)
